meanings.definition: Offensive slang term for a Jewish person.
meanings.sent1: The sheeny was offended by the derogatory term used against him.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to support the sheeny who faced discrimination.
meanings.sent3: The sheeny joked with his friends about the hurtful word, trying to lighten the mood.
meanings.sent4: Despite the hurtful label, the sheeny stood tall and proud of his heritage.
meanings.sent5: The sheeny's resilience in the face of prejudice inspired others to speak out against hate.

meanings.sent1: The sheeny fabric caught the light and sparkled beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The sheeny surface of the lake reflected the colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The sheeny car attracted attention wherever it went, gleaming in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a sheeny quality, bright and full of life.
meanings.sent5: The sheeny jewelry added a touch of elegance to her outfit, shimmering with every movement.
